thread.title: Molly Stirling
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Molly Stirling

author: Molly Stirling
title: Molly Stirling
text:
I just wanted to write this review as I was initially nervous that the 80% off Kayla Itsines BBG was a scam. I would like to verify that is isn't a scam at all - I paid for the complete package with the 80% reduction in place and the guides and diet plan was emailed to me within minutes.
Thank you.
